definition: lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: Facial expression agreeable sweetheart of quite intimate.
sentences.chinese: 神情好似情人間的耳鬢廝磨。

sentences.english: If someone prayed for the family to be closer, do you think God zaps them with warm fuzzy feelings.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人祈求家庭和睦，上帝是給他耳鬢廝磨的感覺。

sentences.english: Under Iran's Islamic law, unmarried couples are not allowed to mingle.
sentences.chinese: 按照伊朗的伊斯蘭教法，未婚戀人是不能耳鬢廝磨的。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
lit. a dream of Nanke/fig. dreams of grandeur
lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
to have been through the hardships of life/to have been through the mill
lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

definition: to fight for fame, grab profit (idiom); scrambling for fame and wealth/only interested in personal gain
